articles.author: Sara Moniuszko
articles.title: What is the HMPV virus in China? The human metapneumovirus and its symptoms, explained. - CBS News
articles.description: The human metapneumovirus is reportedly surging in China, but should Americans be concerned? Here's what to know about HMPV symptoms and more.
articles.content:
The human metapneumovirus, also known as HMPV, is reportedly surging in China, raising questions about what the illness is and if it's a concern to those in the U.S.
